name: Sorry I'm Not Food
description:
Sorry I’m Not Food is a 2D infinite runner in which a knight is forced to sprint through a dark forest avoiding all kinds of obstacles to get away from a zombie princess trying to devour him.

DEVELOPED BY:

AMBERSTER GAMES

Programming:

  • Raffaele Iavicoli
  • Valentina Imperatrice

Game Design:

  • Piero Di Giovacchino
  • Vito Palermo
  • Nicola Santini

Concept Art:

  • Lorenzo Castriota
  • Remo Recchia
